title: Old Coins
selftext: Found these in my late grandfather's collection, are these coins special or worth anything?
comments: are these coins pricey? i've heard some old coins go for quite a lot of money
I have no idea, I just found them and that's why I'm asking to know if they worth holding on to.

i think they are, there are some instagram pages which buy coins, i've come across some olx ads too selling coins for 1-2 lakh rupees

you might have a coin worth some good money, search it up
